title: Sample Letter
body:
MEMORANDUM University of Hawaii Community College Case No. [case_number]

Office of the Chancellor

[form_submitted_date]
TO: [assignee_name]
[assignee_title]
[assignee_office_department]
FROM: [assignee_name]
[assignee_title]
[assignee_office_department]

SUBJECT: APPOINTMENT AS FACT-FINDERS

I am appointing you to serve as fact-finders to conduct an investigation into a complaint that [campus] [person_affiliation] [person_name], [person_job_title], of [person_office_department] engaged in behavior that may have violated University of Hawaii policies and procedures.

The specific allegations of possible misconduct by [person_name], include but are not limited to the following: [incident_description]; and other related violations, as may be determined.

Please conduct your fact-finding through the review of all applicable records, documents, interviews with the relevant parties, and appropriate witnesses and submit a report to me of your findings. Upon completion of the investigation and review of the report, I will make a decision on whether or not the evidence supports the allegations and what, if any, appropriate action should be taken.

Thank you for your assistance in this matter.
